subsection_content:
Infertility is a term that describes the inability to conceive in couples despite having regular sex without using any contraception for 6 months to more than 1 year. This is the loss of fertility in couples who want to have children. In addition, infertility is also a term to refer to women who can conceive but are not able to get pregnant until giving birth. (first)
There are many causes of infertility, it can be due to the husband or wife or both. This condition is also likely to occur in couples who use multiple methods of preventing pregnancy.
Previously, infertility was considered an incurable disease that could not be treated. However, today, with the development of technology and science, infertility is no longer a disease that is difficult to treat. Therefore, to increase the chance of conception, couples should go for infertility examination and treatment as soon as possible.

vo sinh.json. What is infertility?
Infertility is a term that describes the inability to conceive in couples despite having regular sex without using any contraception for 6 months to more than 1 year. This is the loss of fertility in couples who want to have children. In addition, infertility is also a term to refer to women who can conceive but are not able to get pregnant until giving birth. (first)
There are many causes of infertility, it can be due to the husband or wife or both. This condition is also likely to occur in couples who use multiple methods of preventing pregnancy.
Previously, infertility was considered an incurable disease that could not be treated. However, today, with the development of technology and science, infertility is no longer a disease that is difficult to treat. Therefore, to increase the chance of conception, couples should go for infertility examination and treatment as soon as possible.
